mapper.select: SELECT prospect_id, name, alt_names, ardf_number FROM prospect ORDER BY LOWER(name)

SELECT k.keyword_id, k.name AS keyword, COUNT(*) AS count FROM borehole AS b JOIN inventory_borehole AS ib ON ib.borehole_id = b.borehole_id JOIN inventory_keyword AS ik ON ik.inventory_id = ib.inventory_id JOIN inventory AS i ON i.inventory_id = ik.inventory_id JOIN keyword AS k ON k.keyword_id = ik.keyword_id WHERE b.prospect_id = #{prospect_id} AND i.active AND k.keyword_id IN ( SELECT keyword_id FROM keyword WHERE name = 'residues' OR keyword_group_id IN ( SELECT keyword_group_id FROM keyword_group WHERE name = 'source' OR name = 'material' ) ) GROUP BY k.keyword_id, k.name ORDER BY k.name

SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_Collect(geog::GEOMETRY)::GEOGRAPHY, 5, 0) AS geojson FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (ST_AsBinary(geog)) geog FROM borehole AS bh JOIN borehole_geog AS bg ON bh.borehole_id = bg.borehole_id WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{prospect_id} ) AS q
